summary: Changes alot of stuff, including weight and enhancements.
descriptionHtml:
Any Issues, please let me know

Here you go Cody, 

This mod is for my friends. But of course anyone is welcome to it. 

This mod Requires Dawnguard. 

Oh, My Tweaks, Lets see if I can remember what all I did. 

First this mod adjust the weights of all Weapons and most armors. I lowered them to a more realistic level.

The more powerful Artifacts way about one pound. I feel this says something about their otherworldly power. Dwarven weigh slightly more then most weapons but on average  your looking at.

Bows - 4
Daggers - 1.2
Swords - 4
WarAxe - 2
Mace - 4
Greatsword - 7
Battleaxe - 7 
Warhammer - 8

It also adjust the weights of potions and Scrolls. 
For example
Weak Poison.1
Poison- .2
Potent Poison-.3
Virulent Poison- .4
Deadly Poison- .5

Artifacts are now more powerful. They can be tempered and all have been changed to have unlimited charges. 

WEAPONS- 

Ebony Smithing perk addes too:
Blade of Sacrifice
Ebony Blade
Mace of Molag Bal
Mehrunes\' Razor
Nettlebane
Nightingale Blade
Nightingale Bow
Volendrung
Chillrend
Dawnbreaker


Keening: Can be tempered Uses dwarven smithing perk

No longer uses enchantment charge
Auriel\'s Bow
Sanguine Rose
Skull of Corruption
Staff of Magnus: Does 50 magicka and health damage (original 20)
Volendrung: Does 28 base damage (original 25)
wAbbAJAcK
Keening: Does 10 base damage (original 8)
Nightingale Bow: Max Level (46+ Version for all Levels)
Nightingale Blade: Max Level (46+ Version for all Levels)
Dragonbane: Max Level (46+ version)
Chillrend:
Dawnbreaker: Does 16 base damage (original 12), Does 20 fire damage (original 10)
Blade of Woe: Does 20 absorb health damage (original 10)

Can be tempered Uses steel smithing perk
Wuuthrad
Blade of Woe

ARMOR

Spellbreaker - Uses Dwarven

Uses steel smithing perk
Ancient Shrouded Set
Guild Master\'s Set (thieves guild):
Shield of Ysgramor
Shrouded Set
Thieves Guild Set


Can be tempered Uses ebony smithing perk
Nightingale Set
Masque of Clavicus Vile


Savior\'s Hide: Armor and Enchantment Increased 

Targe of the Blooded: Has 30 base armor rating (original 20)

Blacksmith and Enchanting potions have their durations increased both those crafted and purchased cause I don\'t like playing beat the clock in Crafting mode. 

The value of many books have been increased so that they make more practical loot. Books I feel should be wroth more as they were in Morrowind.
author: Not Cody
